# EXISTING STRUCTURES

# ERROR TIPS
### Burner mining drill and furnace not working
- Burner mining drill at x=3.0 y=-73.0 and x=-15.0 y=-50.0 are not working because they do not have fuel or there is no coal in the inventory. Add coal to the inventory or to the drills.
- The furnace at x=4.0 y=-69.0 is not full output. Check the output of the furnace and ensure it is not blocked.

# NAMESPACE
